meanings.definition: To inscribe or engrave with characters
meanings.sent1: She charactered her name on the tree trunk with a sharp rock.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tablet was charactered with mysterious symbols.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel charactered its initials on the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was charactered in his heart forever.
meanings.sent5: The hero charactered his bravery on the shield for all to see.

meanings.definition: Having a distinctive quality or feature
meanings.sent1: The charactered door had intricate carvings that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: Her charactered style always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The charactered cake was not only delicious but also beautifully decorated.
meanings.sent4: The charactered sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The charactered mountain peak was visible from miles away.

meanings.definition: A person in a novel, play, or movie
meanings.sent1: The main charactered in the story was a brave knight on a quest.
meanings.sent2: She played the lead charactered in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The quirky charactered stole the show with his comedic timing.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious charactered kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent5: The villainous charactered was booed by the audience during the play.
